channel.title: Half-Life HD Pack Permanently in All HL1 Games
channel.description:
Lambda Generation sent out a tweet a few days ago stating that Valve has updated Half-Life and removed the original models and has replaced them all with the Blue Shift HD pack. I booted up may game and sure enough, the HD pack was in there. Has anyone else noticed this? I figured the HL community would be in a huge rage right now???
[b]EDIT: [/b]I should also add that this HD pack cannot be removed from the game as it was originally. Going to the HD pack page on Steam and selecting the uninstall option simply displays a window that says the HD pack isn't installed.
